parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Preloads the scene for the prepared camera with given timeout after which preloading is aborted. Max timeout is 30 seconds. Timeout of 0 means max timeout of 30 seconds as well. <br><br><template><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command will read prepared params set with [[camPrepareFOV]], [[camPreparePos]] and [[camPrepareTarget]], so no [[camCommitPrepared]] is necessary. If [[camPrepareFOV]] is not set, the default value is 1. If [[camPrepareTarget]] (for direction) and [[camPreparePos]] (for position) are not set, current [[direction]] and [[position]] of the camera are used. The prepared camera preload will preload main camera as well. [[cameraEffect]] is not necessary</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''camPreload''' timeout

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> timeout: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _camera '''camPreload''' 5 </code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Preload camera around player to avoid stuttering on optics zooming: <code>[] [[spawn]] 
{
	_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] ([[player]] [[selectionPosition]] "camera");
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] 359 [[do]]
	{
		_cam [[setDir]] _i; 
		_cam [[camPrepareFov]] 0.25; 
		_cam [[camPreload]] 0;
		[[waitUntil]] { [[camPreloaded]] _cam };
	};
	[[camDestroy]] _cam;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camPreloaded]], [[preloadCamera]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
